org.silex.runtime.domobject.base.DOMObjectBase

type
class
subclasses
org.silex.runtime.domobject.js.DOMObject
This is a base class for runtime specific DOMObject. A DOMObject is an abstraction of the visual base element of a runtime. For instance in JS, a DOMObject is an HTML element, like a
or element. In Flash AS3, a domObject is a Sprite. A Domobject can contain other DOMObjects. This class abstracts manipulating DOM elements, each runtime is implemented in an inheriting class

Static Variables

rootDOMObject : DOMObjectBase

A reference to the DOMObject at the top of the DOM

Constructor

new(referenceToNativeDOMObject : Dynamic)
class constructor. Set the reference to the native DOMObject and initialise it

Instance Variables

onDoubleClick : Void -> Void

The callback called when the DOMObject is double-clicked

onFocusIn : Void -> Void

The callback called when the DOMObject gains focus TO DO

onFocusOut : Void -> Void

The callback called when the DOMObject loses focus TO DO

onMouseMove : Void -> Void

The callback called when the mouse moves over the DOMObject

onMouseWheel : Void -> Void

The callback called when there is a mouse wheel event over the DOMObject TO DO

onPress : Void -> Void

The callback called on press of the DOMObject

onRelease : Void -> Void

The callback called on release of the DOMObject

onRollOut : Void -> Void

The callback called on rollout of the DOMObject

onRollOver : Void -> Void

The callback called on rollover of the DOMObject

Instance Methods

addChild(domObject : DOMObjectBase) : Void

parameters
domObject the DOMObject to attach to this DOMObject
Set the current DOMObject as the parent of the added domObject, and store it in the children array. Overriden by each runtime, to add the child to native DOM.

getAttribute(propertyName : String) : Dynamic

parameters
propertyName the name of the field value to return
returns
might be any type
Return the value of a field of the native object

getChildren() : Array<DOMObjectBase>

returns
an array of DOMObject
returns the children of this DOMObject

getHeight() : Int

getParent() : DOMObjectBase

Returns the DOMObject parent of this DOMObject

getReferenceToNativeDOM() : Dynamic

returns
a Sprite in AS, an HTML element in JS, a ressource in PHP
Returns the reference to this DOMObject native DOM element

getRotation() : Int

getWidth() : Int

getX() : Int

getY() : Int

getZOrder() : Int

removeChild(domObject : DOMObjectBase) : Void

parameters
domObject the DOMObject to remove from this DOMObject
Reset the parent of the remove child object as it no longer is attached to the DOM, remove it also from the children array. Overrident by each runtime to remove also from the native DOM

setAttribute(propertyName : String, propertyValue : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
propertyName the name of the field
propertyValue the new value of the field
Set a field value on the native DOM object

setHeight(value : Int) : Void

setParent(domObject : DOMObjectBase) : Void

set the parent of this DOMObject

setRotation(value : Int) : Void

setWidth(value : Int) : Void

setX(value : Int) : Void

setY(value : Int) : Void

setZOrder(value : Int) : Void
